评论详情: The quality and sizing is spot on. More expensive but well worth it. Will buy again.
I am a big Carhartt fan and glad my wife bought this for me. I recommend this to anyone. Fits great and feels awesome.

2 minutes after putting on, the sleeves become so loose that you have to push them up past your elbows to keep them from moving(which only stretches them more), too bad cuz this could have been a killer item to wear

This is "Relaxed" fit so it fits truer to size than typical Carhartt. I normally wear XL so I bought XL. Everything fits great EXCEPT the length. This pullover is about 2 inches too long. It looks silly. I haven't decided if I'm going to wear this tucked in or what. Normally I'd return it because I know it'll bother me, but I already washed it. I should also mention that it's not "mid weight". It's the weight of a typical heavyweight t-shirt. Collar is good, quality zipper, sleeves are of good length. It's just way too long in the torso :/
My husband loved this jacket I got him for Christmas. So cozy and lightweight!
Comfortable and great fit

评论概述: This Quarter Zip is the one you're wife steals at night
评论详情: Great price! My wife steals mine at night to keep her warm! Washed well! Good to dress down a polo.
I love the lightweight and wicking nature of this  shirt.  I’ve found it great for late summer early and late fall.
Exactly what you would expect from Carhartt nice quality nice fit good looking shirt

I wished I heeded the advice of the negative reviews about the quality of fabric of this quarter zip. The material is super thin, and almost rough/scratchy. Also the sizing runs huge! I ordered the size small for my husband and it is insanely long. I tried shrinking it in the wash and had no luck. Usually carhartt has better quality pieces but they just completely missed the mark with this one. If you are going to go through with purchasing consider that it runs large and it may not fit as desired.

The material is very thin, it doesn’t release stains in wash. Stitching is all exposed, panels are all roughly cut so seams rub exposed skin. Chest pocket doesn’t fit a phone with a case. I have been wearing Carhartt clothes for over 35 yrs this is the worst quality, probably counterfeit

It's a carhartt, what else needs to be said. Added another color to the collection and all of them fit nicely. IT would be nice if they made Large-Tall or XL-Tall to give you the length in the body and SLEEVES for guys over 6'3" with long arms. That's my only gripe, the sleeve length is not quite long enough and stops well above the wrist. Still a decent quality.

I'm a die hard Carhartt fan. I love the fit, feel, and most of all durability. So when it came time to improve my wardrobe I turned to my favorite trusted brand and found these. I don't wear them on the job site. I actually use these for Church and Date night. They have a great fit and my wife likes how I look in them. Plus I'm a worker, so I like knowing that even though I'm wearing something that looks nicer, it's still a Carhartt. It will preform if I need it to.
Very nice shirt.  Loose fit. Maybe a tad long but if yiu are fairly tall it is perfect

This is not the quality that I expected from Carhart.  The force fabric of this style is not the same as the tshirts.  The collar and zipper are not sewn well therefore it doesn’t sit comfortably around the neck.
Color was nor as shown

My husband,160-165lbs, 5’7, wears a medium and that is what I got him, way too big for him. Same with my brother, 190-205 lbs, 6’1, he wears an XL it way to big for him. Retuned them both and sized down!
The product says Carhartt but when it came in the mail it was not even close to it.
It’s a nice shirt, but it’s not what I was looking for. I wanted something with a little more weight to it.
Good layering shirt. Runs large.

Got size medium and I’m 5-11” 170lbs and it fit well, not too baggy and not fitted. Sleeves are little long but for me was right size just the very thin material was not what I expected although very soft and smooth. I liked that but wanted heavier weight
Cumple
I wear this when I ride my motorcycle on hot days. Really nice material. My only complaint is they don’t have an extra small and it hangs down about mid thigh for me.
The neck is kind of strange., too floppy sort of.
Very comfortable shirt fits perfectly my new favorite work shirt going into fall!
Ordered it a size too big to allow for shrinkage. Worked out well.
Purchased for myself and has a great feel and fit.
Well made.
I honestly regret this purchase. It is a plasticy material and not at all what I wanted
Perfect fit
Very comfy! Love the material!!
Was exactly as described.  Works good in the fall weather or the cold
This is the perfect long sleeve. It looks in the picture as if it would be a thick sweater but this is a nice thin material not too thin. Stretchy and true to size. Absolutely love it.
Lightweight and warm. True to size. Extra stitching looks like it will hold up. Mock collar looks great for work and casual.
Good news…it’s Carhartt…bad news…the fit is terrible

I mean, it's Carhartt. Make USA citizens the only number one concern. The worker, the sweat drenched, broke back, working their ass off American. Stop making everything so damn expensive. The blue collar, all American men and women should be able to afford working clothes, and food. Not have to decide to get that rugged warm work jacket, or feed their children. It's quite the nice T-shirt love it.im going to get a nother one.
I have a few of these i different colors. Great to start the day and easy off when it warms up in the afternoon. I’m 5’11 and 160 I wear a medium. Fits great.
Dad loves this! Super comfy and light for cool mornings

I have lots of Carhartt shirts and sweatshirts, I have always loved the fit, they run big in the loose fit for the sweatshirts which is great, I love the fit of the force T-shirts, fit true to size. Carhart is my favorite brand
Bought this product for my husband for work. He liked them. Lightweight. Not too hot. Very comfortable. Would buy again when it starts to cool down again
This wears and washes very well, highly recommend it.
my favorite shirt
great shirt. My husband lives it. SO SO SOFT. I hang it out to dry as he is very tall. But could be dried otherwise.
It was of high quality, is comfortable, and appears durable.
Too long not color as shown

This shirt looked so nice! I had him pair it with the Carhartt puffer and it made a really nice outfit that he can wear out, or to a daytime event. He has even worn it to work and has gotten many compliments! We like the style, fit, and quality.
Not what I expected just a thin long sleeve shirt. Nice though
Nice, fits big. Ships in a clear package - it was suppose to be a gift for Father’s Day but arrived clearly visible to what it was.
